overview: Are politics sexy? They are in Italy. The Italian Prime Minister impresses visiting foreign dignitaries with glamorous high class hookers; the result is a scandalous sex party that could bring down the government. Two journalists have evidence that the corridors of power heave with big tits, deep anal, tight DP's and banging orgies. But be careful! You never know who is filming everything you do then selling the sex tape to the highest bidder.
title: The Prime Ministers Sex Tape
